thread.title: Kerrie Wenzel

author: Kerrie Wenzel
title: Kerrie Wenzel
text: I had narrowed down catering to three restaurants, but noticed that I on my first order with EZcater, I got a fifty dollar discount. So I gave them a call because I very nervous about spending $400 with a company that I wasn't sure of. They totally delivered !!! I was so glad I used them and was so impressed with the customer service . I would highly recommend them.
